actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
special_abilities.desc: The strider has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing or sight.

special_abilities.name: Trackless Travel
special_abilities.desc: The strider can't be tracked by nonmagical means.

special_abilities.name: Trained Accuracy
special_abilities.desc: The striders weapon attacks deal an extra 7 (2d6) damage (included below).
